name: School Budget Fund Run
description:
UPitt Games4SocialImpact Game Jam Submission

School Budget Fund Run is a one tap endless runner in which elementary school students are sent off by their teacher to fundraise in an attempt to save the ruined school budget. Made with Unity

How many dollars can each kid collect before falling or running into a cactus? Is it enough to pay for the year's school supplies? (Probably not).

Game Jam Theme: Social Impact and "ruin"

This game is about the "ruin"ed school budget. It addresses the lack of funding in public schooling. Some public teachers have even resorted to paying out of their own pocket to provide their students with sufficient school supplies! This game emphasizes the idea that funding for K-12 education should be a high priority. Children shouldn't have to struggle for access to basic elementary education.

Controls:

Just the space bar to jump and to continue from the dialogue popup. Use mouse to click menu buttons.
